SET(MAJOR 2)
SET(MINOR 0)
SET(REVISION 0)
SET(NAME date)
SET(VERSION ${MAJOR}.${MINOR}.${REVISION})
SET(PACKAGE ${NAME}-${VERSION})

EXTERNALPROJECT_ADD(${NAME}
    URL http://github.com/HowardHinnant/${NAME}/archive/v${VERSION}.tar.gz TIMEOUT 180
    PREFIX ${NAME}
    INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
    CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_COMMAND ""
    INSTALL_COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/${NAME}/src/${NAME}/date.h <INSTALL_DIR>/include
)
